_sText:
Contents of This Pack:
==================
This pack contains the exact same maps as my "Orange Arena Map Pack One" collection, but with real textures, for those who don't like orange maps.

Orange Arena Pack One: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/178481

Important part:
===============

This time, the maps for some reason had an issue with the Navigation Mesh (The thing that lets bots know where they can and can't go) so I had to edit it.
When placing the .bsp files into your maps folder, please also place the .nav files, or else bots will be useless.

The main issue was with the Terrorist's spawn on cs_Alley where they couldn't get out of spawn. There wasn't a notable problem with cs_Metropolis, but I included it for safe measures. If you do not, Terrorists on cs_Alley will be stuck in their spawn and not be able to get out.

**I give you permission to download these maps and use them on your server/suggest them to other servers without consulting me.
_However,_ I do not give you permission to re-upload, with or without altering, without consulting me first.**

Installation instructions:
==========================

Drag and drop the .bsp and .nav files into your Counter Strike maps folder.

Possible folder locations:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

If you installed CS:S onto your main/internal hard drive, it should be in one of those locations unless you selected an alternate install location.
________________________________________________________

Many thanks,
**(Lemon) WUNDerDUDe2312**
